title: St Clement’s cake with mulled wine syrup and cranberries
description: ‘Oranges and lemons rang the bells of St Clements’. We can’t sing the praises enough of this Christmassy citrus cake.Equipment and preparation: you will need 23cm/9in round springform cake tin and a clean sheet of muslin.
ingredients: 500ml/18fl oz crème fraîche or thick Greek yoghurt
